lines.text: So, he didn't set himself on fire...
There's all those spellbooks lying around- could've been he was trying to hide evidence of magic.
Yeah- started a fire to burn the books and magic spell components, and stuff.
He got set aflame himself a little bit in the process, but that was just an accident.
Probably explains where the <c=#FF0000>Reversing Rune</c> sticker sheets went, too- into the fire!
Seems like the fire only got to part of the room.
Apart from that sticker sheet theory, it doesn't look like he actually got around to burnin' much.
Because he got shot, I guess?
I dunno... it seems like he wouldn't go around tryin' to destroy evidence <c=#FF00FF>while Slick was still alive.</c>
Huh? But... that'd... the order of the deaths...
Can't go with that idea when it's clear the plan didn't come close to workin', though.
There's gotta be somethin' else to this.
